articles.author: Greg Mills
articles.title: WAR IN EUROPE OP-ED: The Monkey and the Grenade: How the crisis in Ukraine ends - Daily Maverick
articles.description: Unlike South Africa, Ukraine’s basic services keep functioning despite it being in the midst of an all-out war. The power stays on and the trains keep running, whatever the Russians throw at them. There are huge tailbacks at the borders, but this illustrates …
articles.content:
We are fighting for our country and Western values, explain Ukrainians. And we wont stop.
More than anything, it is this sense of patriotism and resourcefulness and a little bit of help from Ukraine… [+5878 chars]
